item.title: Close encounter of Cussac
item.description:
Close encounter incident in Cussac, Cantal, France ðŸ”—

This article discusses the alleged close encounter that occurred in Cussac, Cantal, France in 1967.

Summary ðŸ”—

This section introduces the topic as a claimed close encounter with alien beings by a young brother and sister in Cussac, Cantal, France. It cites a source that refers to the incident as a “close encounter of the third kind,” comparing its fame in France to the Kelly-Hopkinsville encounter in the United States.

Details of the Incident ðŸ”—

This section details the events of August 29, 1967, when a 13-year-old boy and his 9-year-old sister reported seeing four small, black beings about 47 inches tall while watching cows in a field. The children claimed the beings rose into the air and entered a round spaceship, about 15 feet in diameter, that was hovering over the field. Police noted a sulfur odor and dried grass at the alleged takeoff site. The incident is mentioned as one of the UFO sightings investigated by the French government and made public in a mass release of documents in March 2007.
